title: HSI Professional Heat Resistant Glove for Curling and flat iron. Black and red
description: Our heat resistant glove protects your hands from burns while heat styling.

title: Babylisspro TT Tourmaline Titanium Travel Dryer, Red
description: Why sacrifice your hair while vacationing? Enjoy professional class hair drying with the Babyliss Tourmaline Mini Folding Travel 1000 Watt Hair Dryer. Tourmaline is a natural source of negative ions and far-infrared heat. Negative Ions eliminate frizz and close the cuticle to create smooth, shiny hair. Dual Voltage allows for worldwide usage. Pure tourmaline gemstones fused with ceramic.

title: John Frieda Precision Foam Colour, Medium Natural Blonde 8N
description: Precision Foam Colour is the first ever premium permanent home hair colour that uses foam technology to deliver salon-quality results at home.With 20 flattering shades to choose from, achieving flawless, natural-looking results at home has never been quicker or easier.

title: Bath Body Works Aromatherapy Energy Orange Ginger 10 oz Body Wash Foam Bath
description: Buy Bath & Body Works Bath & Shower Gels - Bath & Body Works Aromatherapy Energy Orange Ginger 10 oz Body Wash & Foam Bath. How-to-Use: Apply with a washcloth or sponge to create a rich, cleansing lather.
